name: Easy Analytics for WordPress
author: Austin Walker

sections.description:
This plugin enables Google Analytics for your entire WordPress site. It is a very lightweight plugin and fast with plenty of great features.

Features

  • Blazing fast performance
  • Simple and easy to use
  • Use latest tracking code
  • Includes tracking code in header as recommended by Google
  • Includes tracking code on all WordPress web pages
  • Option to enable page tracking in the Admin Area

This is a lightweight plugin that inserts the required GA tracking code. To view your site statistics, visit your Google Analytics account.
sections.installation:
Installation

  1. Upload the plugin to your WordPress and activate
  2. Visit the settings to configure your options

After configuring your settings, you can verify that Google Analytic tracking code is included by viewing the source code of your web pages.

Note: this plugin adds the required Google Analytics Tracking code to your web pages. In order for the code to do anything, it must correspond to an active, properly configured Google Analytics account. Learn more at the Google Analytics Help Center.

More info on installing WP plugins

Usage

To enable Google Analytics tracking on your site, follow these steps:

  1. Visit the “Plugin Settings” panel
  2. Enter your GA Tracking ID

Save changes and done. After 24-48 hours, you can log into your Google Analytics account to view your stats.

Note that it can take 24-48 hours after adding the tracking code before any analytical data appears in your Google Analytics account. To check that the GA tacking code is included, look at the source code of your web page(s). Learn more at the Google Analytics Help Center.

Uninstalling

Easy Google Analytics cleans up after itself. All plugin settings will be removed from your database when the plugin is uninstalled via the Plugins screen. Your collected GA data will remain in your Google account.

short_description: Easy to add your Google Analytics Tracking Code to your WordPress site.
description:

Features

  • Blazing fast performance

upgrade_notice:
To upgrade Easy Google Analytics, remove the old version and replace with the new version. Or just click "Update" from the Plugins screen and let WordPress do it for you automatically.

Note: uninstalling the plugin from the WP Plugins screen results in the removal of all settings from the WP database.

For more information, visit the GA Plugin Homepage.
upgrade_notice.Got a question?: To ask a question, suggest a feature, or provide feedback, contact me directly at easycodesamples@gmail.com. Learn more about Google Analytics and GA tracking methods.
